subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A two-out, two-run double by Alex Rodriguez had given the Yankees a lead in the seventh, their first lead in 49 innings against Boston, but by the bottom of the eighth, it was gone.
snippet: A two-out, two-run double by Alex Rodriguez had given the Yankees a lead in the seventh, their first lead in 49 innings against Boston, but by the bottom of the eighth, it was gone.
